title: B Specials Parading at the Formation of the Vanguard Party, Ormeau Park, Belfast, Northern Ireland
marks: Signature; Inscriptions in graphite, along bottom edge, verso: [Gilles Per
description: line of men wearing suits and bowler hats; man standing in front of line holding flag which reads \'Ulster Special...Branch\'
creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M. D. Parker
